content: **crocheted bag with granny squares in drops bomull-lin ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #coastalletterbag drops design pattern l-173 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx 34 x 34 cm without shoulder strap 1 square measures approx 24 x 24 cm **yarn** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150 g colour 11 beige 100 g colour 21 dark blue **button** drops button no 804 1 piece **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 10 5 row vertically on hook size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm 18 double crochets in width and 21 double crochets vertically on hook size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized hook or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized hook
